who: The Today's Gold Prices in Egypt website allows you to find out the latest updates on gold prices in the local market in Egypt in Egyptian pounds. It also helps you calculate the value of the dollar at goldsmiths' shops. You can compare ingots and coins prices between famous gold companies in middle east.
who2: We also allow user to know gold prices in SAR, AED, QAR, SYP, TND, YER, PAS, OMR, MAD, LBP, KWD, JOD, and IQD
